Title: Junkyard Dawgs
Plot: Three new inmates arrive, one of whom is close to the O'Reilys; Busmalis and Rebadow prove to be "true Romeos"; the Keller-Beecher-Schillinger triangle gets more pointed; and an awards banquet ends in a fateful discovery.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence,sexual violence,drug use,offensive language and sex scenes.
